title: Rinkeby Faucet Down
body:
https://faucet.rinkeby.io/

I'm not sure if this is the right place to put this, but I hear one of the mods here runs the rinkeby faucet. A ton of new developers are trying to use the rinkeby testnet, and the faucet is malfunctioning.

Is there someone here who owns it and can bring it back up to speed?
Or better yet, can someone send me a bajillion Rinkeby ETH and I'll spin up a new faucet?

~~I'm able to send small amounts of Rinkeby ether to anyone who needs it right now. Just reply with your address.~~

Edit: sorry I'm all out, no more donations :(
@PatrickAlphaC doing the lord's work

> I'm able to send small amounts of Rinkeby ether to anyone who needs it right now. Just reply with your address.

Any chance you have a bajillion?

> Any chance you have a bajillion? 

No but I remember @prestwich asking to trade a bunch of Kovan ETH for Rinkeby ETH. Not sure if it ended up happening.
nah, sorry. nobody ever came through at size

Dang. I also have a bunch of Kovan ETH. 

It looks like the rinkeby ETH faucet address has like infinity Rinkeby ETH. https://rinkeby.etherscan.io/address/0x31b98d14007bdee637298086988a0bbd31184523

> I'm able to send small amounts of Rinkeby ether to anyone who needs it right now. Just reply with your address.

Can you please send me some test ether? 0x45E489Ed5AD1c1Feb25a1e6915Fc6FDb92B9FB03

> > I'm able to send small amounts of Rinkeby ether to anyone who needs it right now. Just reply with your address.
> 
> Any chance you could send me 1 test eth? Would be greatly appreciated, thanks! 0x6E3c03D6971e583800589d163de8D45E870b4B4A

https://rinkeby.etherscan.io/tx/0xd7aeaca71392bdf9eee9bae6030d5475438a88e01b10c9a4691532c031e52f99
Is there anyone who is concerned with this faucet??

Who isn't concerned lol :( the official faucet sucks. Thank you for the test eth. Sent from my Galaxy
-------- Original message --------From: Patrick Collins ***@***.***> Date: 9/14/21  2:39 PM  (GMT-05:00) To: ethereum/go-ethereum ***@***.***> Cc: Cryptendont ***@***.***>, Comment ***@***.***> Subject: Re: [ethereum/go-ethereum] Rinkeby Faucet Down (#23572) 
Is there anyone who is concerned with this faucet??

—You are receiving this because you commented.Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub, or unsubscribe.Triage notifications on the go with GitHub Mobile for iOS or Android.

0xC90827c6b84f09DF250ec9D350b1263AC28d5276
Anyone that can spare some for testing.   Just did the link for 3 days.  Thanks

> 0xC90827c6b84f09DF250ec9D350b1263AC28d5276

https://rinkeby.etherscan.io/tx/0xa7c80f1e13bcacbad7fb3bc4619236f29a18b7c80deeb2974b7be6baf0be91de

> I'm able to send small amounts of Rinkeby ether to anyone who needs it right now. Just reply with your address.

Hey there! Thanks for doing this. Could you send about 2 ETH or whatever you can to this account please? 

0xF2f507Fc09dE774C89882C9cfa07b329AeE9B7C6

I really appreciate the help!

> 0xF2f507Fc09dE774C89882C9cfa07b329AeE9B7C6

Sent https://rinkeby.etherscan.io/tx/0xac1805c5fea14358b1011701e06a4b91507c57839228e25b3ded36f3a818deb8

I'm only able to send 1ETH per person right now

> I'm able to send small amounts of Rinkeby ether to anyone who needs it right now. Just reply with your address.

Hey, whatever you can spare I'd appreciate it greatly 
0xEB67c3B1E98a09374011C007524997213281D9D0

> 0xEB67c3B1E98a09374011C007524997213281D9D0

https://rinkeby.etherscan.io/tx/0x17242cbfb78ab3302db1ec802e8b3cf9b81bba3f2a31244ae8fcbab836951b84

> I'm able to send small amounts of Rinkeby ether to anyone who needs it right now. Just reply with your address.

Heyooo, trying to learn solidity and blockchain dev, some rinkeby ETH would be helpful :)

0xdE0fc5b3764C6a73F10Fd067B0A747c201CcfF5a
0xdF5D009dA09384a3230E46Fef5b52d765eea0fE9
sent @HashUnknown @SChande1

A single eth would help - learning how to mint NFTs to attempt to peddle my Art

0x228980f8d0F92Ce6Dd10e7c924FE0710C6D679DF

> sent @HashUnknown @SChande1

Goated, tysm

> > 0x228980f8d0F92Ce6Dd10e7c924FE0710C6D679DF
> 
> https://rinkeby.etherscan.io/tx/0x085f6361f06c83868601e619436fb2e6e759a27573f57647d1508039a15502f9

Thanks for mine hexcowboy!
I think the faucets are down for some hours, this is my address if someone can help: 0xfB18bf9D136e2Cab530faDB0C2c26bB489F9eb19

I would appreciate some test ETH on Rinkeby! Been looking for a working faucet for the past 2 hours to no avail...

Edit: THANK YOU hexcowboy!!!
sent @mouisaac @miklt

Wow, any chance I could get some too! Been following patrick's smart contracts video but lack the ETH to test my deployment..
Hope the faucet starts working again :( Currently managed to send my URL and the request seems to go through but not receiving the eth.

0x2f6770E6205a9f4eF67534fe84B6e69DC26E36E8

Faucet just worked for me, I have 3ETH now. Thanks!

Can I get some help with Rinkeby test ETH as well? I am trying to test in Gnosis Safe. thanks so much!!

0xE1cEE9F742C3dcB3fe0b18085f547bDc784801fd

Can some one help me with ETH on Rinkeby? 
1-2 ETH would be helpful for us in testing and deployment.
thanks in advance.

0x6300a356bf5d5F24466E567abb550B9fEd12085F
